Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana, 134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage at 130th/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Indiana, 134th, Langley, and 131st, then resume their regular route, due to street blockage near 130th/Eberhart.

Allow extra travel time.
